Improvements.Improvement: Replace if-else block with a switch case
Improvements.Description: The if-else block that checks the value of 'preLongs' can be replaced with a switch case block instead. This would make the code cleaner and more structured.

Improvements.Improvement: Extract Duplicate Code into a Function
Improvements.Description: The code to append common fields to StringBuilder 'sb' is repeated for different cases of 'preLongs'. This code can be extracted into a separate function to reduce redundancy.
